mapper.select: select del_id, subsdetail_id, order_id, invoice_id, del_startdate, del_findate, case when del_state = 1 then '배송대기' when del_state = 2 then '배송중' when del_state = 3 then '배송완료' else '기타' end as del_state, case when del_com = 1 then 'CJ대한통운' when del_com = 2 then '한진택배' when del_com = 3 then '우체국택배' when del_com = 4 then '기타' else '' end as del_com from delinfo
mapper.update: update delinfo set invoice_id=#{invoice_id}, del_startdate=#{del_startdate}, del_findate=#{del_findate}, del_state = case when #{del_state} = '배송대기' then 1 when #{del_state} = '배송중' then 2 when #{del_state} = '배송완료' then 3 else null end, del_com = case when #{del_com} = 'CJ대한통운' then 1 when #{del_com} = '한진택배' then 2 when #{del_com} = '우체국택배' then 3 when #{del_com} = '기타' then 4 else null end where del_id = #{del_id}
